product_name: The North Face Toasty Toes Insulated Bunting - Infant Girls'
long_description: The North Face Toasty Toes bunting cloaks baby girls in an insulated and quilted layer with fold-over mittens and booties for protection from the cold. Quilted body is insulated with Heatseeker(TM) Aero polyester fibers. The North Face Toasty Toes bunting has an asymmetric front zipper for easy entry and exit. Fold-over mittens and booties keep little hands and feet warm; hood warms baby's head and ears.
short_description: The North Face Toasty Toes bunting cloaks baby girls in an insulated and quilted layer with fold-over mittens and booties for protection from the cold.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Insulated Parkas And Pants
